title: Venus Transit in the 12th House for Sagittarius Ascendant
summary: Venus transiting the 12th house for Sagittarius ascendant turns focus inward, highlighting rest, compassion, and subtle pleasures. This phase supports spiritual practices, artistic solitude, and behind-the-scenes creative work. Expenses may rise for comfort, travel, or charity, requiring mindful budgeting. Emotional bonds feel private and introspective, benefiting from honesty and restraint. Peace grows when indulgence is moderated and time is given to healing, reflection, and quiet fulfillment.

sections.heading: Mindset & Balance
points: Desire for escape should be measured

closing: This transit supports rest, healing, and inner refinement. Conscious choices turn solitude into renewal.
